name: Peazip
tagline: Free Zip / Unzip software and Rar file extractor. Cross-platform file and archive manager. Features volume spanning, compression, authenticated encryption. Supports 7Z, 7-Zip sfx, ACE, ARJ, BZ2, CAB, CHM, CPIO, DEB, GZ, ISO, JAR, LHA/LZH, NSIS, OOo, PAQ/LPAQ, PEA, QUAD, RAR, RPM, split, TAR, Z, ZIP, ZIPX.
body:
# PeaZip free archiver

PeaZip is a free file compression software (zip/unzip tool and rar file extractor) available for MS Windows and Linux systems as portable and installable native software.

The project provides a cross-platform alternative to proprietary software (WinZip, WinRar, etc), and works with over 150+ archive formats and variants:
* Full read / write support (compress and decompress) [7Z](http://www.peazip.org/7zip-files-utility.html), ARC, BZip2, GZip, PAQ/LPAQ/ZPAQ, PEA, QUAD/BALZ, [TAR](http://www.peazip.org/tar-windows.html), UPX, WIM, XZ, [ZIP](http://www.peazip.org/zip-files-utility.html)
* Open and extract: [ACE](http://www.peazip.org/ace-files-utility.html), APPX, ARJ, [CAB](http://www.peazip.org/cab-files-utility.html), Compound files, DEB, DMG, [ISO](http://www.peazip.org/iso-image-files.html), LHA, Open Office files, [RAR](http://www.peazip.org/free-rar.html), RPM, UDF, [ZIPX](http://www.peazip.org/zipx-files-software.html)...

## [PeaZip free archiver download](http://www.peazip.org)

## [Quick tutorial, online help](http://www.peazip.org/peazip-help.html)

## [FAQ (handle RAR files, zip/unzip, encryption...)](http://www.peazip.org/peazip-help-faq.html)

![PeaZip archive manager utility](http://www.peazip.org/nav.png)
[PeaZip screenshots](http://www.peazip.org/screenshots-peazip-1.html)

The application deploy a cross-platform front-end GUI for multiple file and archive management Open Source components (7-Zip, FreeArc, PAQ/LPAQ/ZPAQ, PEA, UPX), with special focus on security: support for multiple [archive encryption](http://www.peazip.org/extract-encrypted-files.html) standards for 7Z, ARC, RAR, ZIP, ZIPX file formats (based on AES, Twofish, Serpent algorithms), optional two factor (password + key file) authentication, password manager (optionally encrypted) with random password generator, [secure data deletion](http://www.peazip.org/secure-delete.html) for files and free disk space, calculation of multiple [checksum and hash algorithms](http://www.peazip.org/verify-checksum-hash.html).

The software handle spanned (split) archives (.001, .R01, .Z01, etc) and supports in-archive browsing and searching.

The software is developed using Lazarus IDE (and InnoSetup for Microsoft Windows installers) and released under LGPLv3 license.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
